thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 8 of 178
thread.title: karina schimandl

author: karina schimandl
title: karina schimandl
text:
I find TrustedHousesitters a very good platform for people who are looking for a housesitter or if you are looking for a housesit yourself. You can checke lots of information about your future housesit or housesitter. Very trustful and reliable website. The best thing is that they cover housesits all over the world.
It would even be more convenient if they launch a mobile app for it as the website runs often a bit slow.
